Pre-Game Insights: England vs Pakistan T20I series will start tonight (May 22) in Leeds. It is a four-match series between the two finalists of T20 World Cup 2022.
Pakistan registered a 2-1 T20I series win against Ireland earlier this month.
A majority of the English stars were busy with the IPL. Captain Jos Buttler will try to finalize his playing XI for T20 World Cup 2024 during this series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England have a 19-9 lead in the T20I head-to-head record against Pakistan.
The last time England and Pakistan battled in a T20I was in the T20 World Cup 2022 Final. England won that match by five wickets at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.
The upcoming T20I series will happen in England. Speaking of the head-to-head record between England and Pakistan on English soil, the home team leads by 7-4.
Headingley, Sophia Gardens, Kennington Oval, and Edgbaston are the venues for the four T20Is.
England have won three out of their last five T20Is against Pakistan.
Just before the T20 World Cup, Pakistan hosted England for a seven-match series, where the English team emerged victorious by 4-3.
